info.title: Convergent Invoicing Billable Item - Read
info.description: This API enables you to read billable items in Convergent Invoicing. You can read entire billable items or only parts of the data, using the provided filters.

x-sap-shortText: Read Billable Items in Convergent Invoicing using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Convergent Invoicing - Invoice Creation for Usage and Service(2BG)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2BG " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicing for the Utilities Industry(3L1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3L1 " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicing: Invoice Creation for Usage and Service(OBG)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OBG " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicingï¼šRecurring and One-Off Items(OT3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OT3 " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicing - Management and Rating of Consumption Items(3DX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3DX " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicing - Recurring and One-Off Items(2T3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2T3 " Link To BP ")

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: CABllbleItmPackageUUID
parameters.description: GUID of Package of Billable Items

parameters.name: CABllbleItmPackNo
parameters.description: Sequence Number of Billable Item in Package

parameters.name: ContractAccount
parameters.description: Contract Account Number for Billing and Invoicing

get.summary: Get entity from CABllbleItmMain by key

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET CABllbleItmMain HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$count](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptioncount) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionskip)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [Searching](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionsearch)
